eu.opends.niftyGui

Class KeyMappingGUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.niftyGui.KeyMappingGUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController

    public class KeyMappingGUIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
    This class handles display and user interaction with the key mapping and graphic settings window generated by nifty-gui.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyMappingGUIController(SimulationBasics sim, KeyMappingGUI keyMappingGUI)
      Creates a new controller instance for the key mapping and graphic settings nifty-gui.

      • clickBackButton

        public void clickBackButton()
        Handler for "Back"-button. This will close the GUI.

      • clickApplyButton

        public void clickApplyButton()
        Handler for "Apply"-button. This will apply the currently selected values from the graphic settings GUI to the simulator's settings.
